idea-plugin.name: Better GitHub Theme - BGT
idea-plugin.description:
Better GitHub Theme (BGT) offers a meticulously crafted, modern theme for IntelliJ IDEA that enhances your coding experience. Designed for developers who value a sleek and stylish interface, this theme features:
  • Dark Mode: A comfortable, low-light environment to reduce eye strain during extended coding sessions.
  • Custom Color Scheme: A thoughtfully designed color palette that improves syntax highlighting, with support for italicized text for better readability.
  • GitHub-Inspired Design: Aesthetic elements inspired by GitHub's dark mode, providing a familiar and cohesive user experience.

Why Choose BGT?
Experience a clear, focused design that promotes productivity and transforms your coding environment into a functional and enjoyable workspace. Ideal for developers who prefer dark themes and seek a visually appealing interface.
